variables.name: CLEAR_MSG_A
variables.value: The Primer is trying to interfere with the past and change history. They send a fleet of timeships back in time to alter the course of battle. That is their strategy.

variables.name: CLEAR_MSG_B
variables.value:
We have no way of knowing if our current history is the result of something having been changed or not.
What even is the future, really...?

variables.name: ColorChange_ColorDesc
variables.value:
Press the Y button to create a color of your choice.
Press the A button to set the color; press the B button to return to the previous screen with the set color.

variables.name: ColorChange_ConfirmDefault
variables.value: Are you sure you want to return to the default settings?

variables.name: ColorChange_DefaultDesc
variables.value: All colors will be restored to their default settings.

variables.name: ColorChange_Keyboard_ColorDesc
variables.value:
Press the Y key to create a color of your choice.
Press Enter to set the color; press Esc to return to the previous screen with the set color.

variables.name: ColorChange_PS4Controller_ColorDesc
variables.value:
Press the △ button to create a color of your choice.
Press the ○ button to set the color; press the × button to return to the previous screen with the set color.

variables.name: ColorChange_SwitchController_ColorDesc
variables.value:
Press the X button to create a color of your choice.
Press the B button to set the color; press the A button to return to the previous screen with the set color.

variables.name: Contents_AutoSaveRetry
variables.value:
Auto save failed. 
To retry auto save, select YES. 
If you select NO, the game data will not be saved until the next auto save.

variables.name: Contents_AutoSaveRetry_ReturnTitle
variables.value:
Auto save failed. 
To retry auto save, select YES. 
If you select NO, you will lose your current progress.

variables.name: Contents_SaveSlotDelete
variables.value: Are you sure you want to delete the save data in this slot?

variables.value: Are you sure you want to delete the save data in this slot?

variables.name: Contents_SaveSlotDeleteMiss
variables.value: Failed to delete the save data.

variables.name: Contents_SaveSlotDeleted
variables.value: The save data has been deleted.

variables.name: Contents_SlotBroken
variables.value:
Earth Defense Force 6 save data corrupted.
You must select a different slot to play or delete the corrupted Earth Defense Force 6 save data.

variables.name: Contents_SlotBrokenRemakeSave

The slot file is corrupted.
Select YES if you want to delete the corrupted slot file and retry saving your game data. Select NO to cancel saving.

variables.name: Contents_SlotRestoreAsk

Do you want to restore the save data slot from a backup?
When the restore process is complete, you will be returned to the title screen.

variables.name: Contents_SystemBrokenRemake
variables.value:
The system file is corrupted.
Delete the corrupted system file, and create a new one.

variables.name: Contents_SystemBrokenRemakeSave
variables.value:
The system file is corrupted.
To delete the corrupted system file and continue saving your game data, select YES. 
To cancel saving, select NO.

variables.name: GameMode_DescOnlineScenario
variables.value:
Start online game. Up to four players can work together to complete a mission.
There will be no tutorial mission. Learn the controls in an offline game first.

variables.name: GameMode_DescScenario
variables.value:
Start offline game. 1 player. Gather items, strengthen the player character, and clear all the missions.

Tutorial mission available at the beginning.

variables.name: GameMode_DescTwoPlayers
variables.value:
Start two-player split-screen mode. You will need two controllers to play in this mode.

Tutorial mission available at the beginning.

variables.name: GameMode_Desc_Offline_MissionPack01
variables.value:
Lost Days

Play the Mission Pack 1 offline. Take on super hard missions. Play the game on hard difficulty to receive a new weapon.

variables.name: GameMode_Desc_Offline_MissionPack02
variables.value:
Visions of Malice

Play the Mission Pack 2 offline. Take on the challenges of combat training simulator that are managed and operated by the Strategic Information Division. Play the game on a hard difficulty to receive a new weapon.

variables.name: GameMode_Desc_Online_MissionPack01
variables.value:
Lost Days

Play the Mission Pack 1 online. Take on super hard missions. Play the game on hard difficulty to receive a new weapon.

variables.name: GameMode_Desc_Online_MissionPack02
variables.value:
Visions of Malice

Play the Mission Pack 2 online. Take on the challenges of combat training simulator that are managed and operated by the Strategic Information Division. Play the game on a hard difficulty to receive a new weapon.

variables.name: INGAME_STORY_TEXT_M011
variables.value:
The Earth Defense Force 6
begins now.

variables.name: INGAME_STORY_TEXT_M039
variables.value:
We go back in time,
and the accident reoccurs.
Time does not move forward.

The Earth Defense Force 7
begins now.

variables.name: INGAME_STORY_TEXT_M055
variables.value:
Destroyed mobile base,
barely preventing a major enemy offensive.

3 years later...

variables.name: INGAME_STORY_TEXT_M066
variables.value:
This cascade of light...
It's the same.
But...
Something's definitely off.

The Earth Defense Force 8
begins now.

variables.name: INGAME_STORY_TEXT_M093_2
variables.value:
Humanity has won a series of major victories.
And yet... the fighting continues.

3 years later...

variables.name: INGAME_STORY_TEXT_M099
variables.value:
We succeeded.
But there is no guarantee that it won't happen again.
Still...
There is hope.
Surely...

The Earth Defense Force 9
begins now.

variables.name: INGAME_STORY_TEXT_M116
variables.value:
Mothership Number 11 successfully destroyed.
And yet...
The Primer continued to fight.
As though without fear of death.

3 years later...

variables.name: INGAME_STORY_TEXT_RM081
variables.value:
Devastating attack by 10 motherships.
And yet...
Humans continued to fight.
To protect what was important to them.

3 years later...

variables.name: InviteType_Leader_Desc
variables.value: Only the leader can send invitations

variables.name: Invite_Default
variables.value:
Calling all Earth Defense Force soldiers. The Earth is in danger. Prepare for immediate deployment!
【%MODENAME%】
【%MISSIONNAME%】
【%DIFFICULTY%】

variables.name: LevelSelect_Easy_Desc
variables.value:
Winning battles is a breeze in this mode, but you're unlikely to find any worthwhile weapons. Select this mode when a mission is too hard for you.

[Friendly Fire Damage]

10% of normal damage
Your attacks don't knock your allies down.

variables.name: LevelSelect_Hard_Desc
variables.value:
This mode is challenging. Try this mode after you have completed NORMAL mode, increased your Armor (HP) and obtained a respectable arsenal. 

[Friendly Fire Damage]

50% of normal damage
Your attacks don't knock your allies down.

variables.name: LevelSelect_Hardest_Desc
variables.value:
This is much harder than HARD mode. Winning requires not only high-end equipment, but well-honed skills. For experienced and confident players.

[Friendly Fire Damage]

75% of normal damage

variables.name: LevelSelect_Inferno_Desc
variables.value:
A special difficulty, requiring exceptional gear, great skills and careful strategies. You don't have to play this mode.

[Friendly Fire Damage]

100% of normal damage

variables.name: LevelSelect_Normal_Desc
variables.value:
This is the regular difficulty. Try to complete this mode first.

[Friendly Fire Damage]

25% of normal damage
Your attacks don't knock your allies down.

variables.name: LoadSaveInfo_SlotCorruptDesc
variables.value: The save data in this slot is corrupted.

variables.name: LoadSaveInfo_SlotDesc
variables.value: Continue the game where you left off.

variables.name: LoadSaveInfo_SlotExistBackupDesc
variables.value: The save data in this slot is corrupted. Press OK to restore from backup.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_001
variables.value:
Infantry special forces. Rangers are combat experts who can handle a wide range of weapons. They are also licensed to operate military vehicles on the battlefield.

*This soldier class is the easiest to use and has the highest combat strength. If you are playing the game for the first time, you should start out by choosing this soldier class.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_002
variables.value:
An all-female special forces unit equipped with jetpacks. They carry state-of-the-art energy weapons instead of ballistic weapons to reduce weight. They deal the most damage among all classes.

*This soldier class is swift and deadly. However, their low HP (Armor) and defensive strength make them particularly susceptible to attacks.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_003
variables.value:
A tactical soldier that is equipped with a communication system. The mission of the Air Raider is to work with the air force and provide coordinates for air strikes. The Air Raider annihilates the enemy by calling in bombers and gunships and designating attack targets. An Air Raider can even request vehicle drops.

*This soldier class is for intermediate players. It has the potential to deal a lot of damage, but it has to find itself in certain optimal situations to do so. Because the main purpose of this soldier class is to assist allies, it is best suited for cooperative gameplay. You should probably select this soldier class after you've gained a certain degree of familiarity with the game.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_004
variables.value:
A heavily armed soldier fully equipped with a powered exoskeleton. Thanks to their powered exoskeletons, this soldier class is capable of equipping enormous weapons. Also, this soldier class can carry separate weapons in both arms and wield both of them at the same time. 

*This soldier class is for advanced players. Its controls are different from those of other soldier classes, and playing this class well requires learning several new techniques. Mastery of this class will grant players terrifying power, but the path to mastery is very challenging.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_005
variables.value: You can aim even while you're being bitten. Aim at the enemy, and press the attack button to shoot. You can escape from an enemy that is biting you by defeating it.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_006
variables.value: You can switch weapons even while you're being bitten. Aim at the enemy, and attack! But remember that using explosives is dangerous. You may blow yourself up.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_007
variables.value: You can aim even when you've been caught in a net. Aim for the net and attack! You can escape by destroying the net. But remember that using explosives is dangerous. You may blow yourself up.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_008
variables.value: Aranea threads are extremely dangerous. If you are caught in an Aranea web, you will be pulled toward the Aranea with a tremendous force. The only way to save yourself from a web is to defeat the Aranea that created it.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_009
variables.value: Aranea use threads to pull in their prey, and they bind their prey with spider nets. If you get stuck in a net, you can escape from the net by destroying it.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_010
variables.value:
Some vehicles can only be driven by Air Raiders and Rangers. The Fencers and Wing Divers have larger equipment and can't enter a pilot seat. Check the instruction manual for further details.

Only pilot seats have these restrictions. Gunner seats and compartment seats can be mounted by all classes.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_011
variables.value: Get close to ally soldiers with icons over their heads, and recruit them. The soldiers you recruit will fall under your command and will work together with you. If you recruit a team leader, the entire team will fall under your command.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_012
variables.value: By obtaining healing items, you can heal all the soldiers under your command. Try to team up as much as possible.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_013
variables.value:
You can read the instruction manual under the Pause screen even during the game. Try to read through the manual. 

Each class has a special action. Read the instruction manual to utilize them.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_014
variables.value:
A Ranger will put down the weapon when dashing in order to lower enemy awareness. Your mind will focus on your feet hence increasing the item collection range during dash. In addition, you can also increase collection range by equipping probes.

Your enlarged item collection range will be indicated by a circle. You will automatically acquire the items within the circle.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_015
variables.value: Some weapons come with a laser sight. You can use it to confirm whether a target is within range. If a target is in range, a red dot will appear at the center of the reticle. If you are out of range, the red dot will not be displayed, and you will not be able to hit the target.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_016
variables.value: You have to use a beacon to designate the target when requesting a gunship attack. However, if the beacon doesn't land on a target within range, the attack will fail. You can use the laser sight to confirm whether a target is in range. If it is within range, a red dot will appear.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_017
variables.value: An icon will appear when another player is being bitten. If you see this icon, save the other player immediately. The other player will be free after you defeat the enemy that's taken a liking to them.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_018
variables.value: Some weapons used by Fencers have two functions. For example, if you have a Vibro Hammer in your right hand, not only can you use it to attack by pressing the right-hand attack button, you can also use it for a thrust-dash by pressing the right-hand equipment use button.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_019
variables.value: A Fencer's shield is an extremely powerful piece of equipment. However, shields do have their drawbacks. For example, while brandishing a shield, a Fencer's walking speed will be reduced, and shields can only be used to block attacks from the front. (The angles from which attacks can be blocked vary depending on the shield.)

variables.name: Loading_Desc_020
variables.value:
Even if you fail a mission, you will still acquire a certain amount of items. The amount of items received scales with difficulty.

EASY: 100%
NORMAL: 75%
HARD: 50%
HARDEST: 25%
INFERNO: 0%

variables.name: Loading_Desc_021
variables.value: To reload air raids and vehicle drop requests, you need 'credits'. You will get more credits as you defeat enemies. Enemies defeated by ally soldiers and other players will also count as credits.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_022
variables.value: When Wing Divers are knocked down, they can recover quickly by pressing the flight button. Be aware that this consumes Energy Gauge.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_023
variables.value: You cannot carry two of the same weapons. Only the Fencer can equip the same weapons.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_024
variables.value:
The same weapons will perform differently. For example, Magazine Capacity and Damage can both be customized.

You can upgrade a weapon once you acquire two or more of the same kind. For further details, please read the instruction manual.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_025
variables.value: The Ranger's backpack tool lets you reload hand-held weapons without interruption. Use it for cover while reloading.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_026
variables.value:
Androids are equipped with wired, ejectable knives in their hands.
They are powerful weapons, but they can be shot down before they hit.
Just aim and fire away!

variables.name: Loading_Desc_027
variables.value:
When mankind discovered aliens, they built three submarine carriers.
Invaders from space aren't likely to anticipate the perils of the deep sea―they thought―so perhaps the safest place to fight an alien war is underwater. With this in mind, the submarines' hulls, over a kilometer in length, were loaded with vast quantities of weapons and ammunition, food and medicine, and even plant seeds and DNA from living organisms.
In the event of an emergency, the ships would hide deep in the ocean, offering supplies to support the war effort over an extended period of time. In the unlikely event that humanity is wiped out, it will play an integral role in Earth's rebirth.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_028
variables.value: Giant Androids are protected by thick armor and cannot be easily destroyed. However, continuous attacks will damage the armor's surface. Aiming for the damaged areas can make them flinch.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_029
variables.value:
The Kruul's shields are strong, but some weapons, such as grenades, can inflict extra damage. Keep an eye on your damage indicators.
That said, there's no guarantee that these weapons are truly effective. Get creative with your strategy!

variables.name: Loading_Desc_030
variables.value: The giant android Cyclops has a big bullseye on its head. It's probably some sort of vision sensor, which is considered to be its only weak point. Don't bother attacking anywhere else!

variables.name: Loading_Desc_031
variables.value:
The Excavators, a subterranean drilling robot, is protected by armor. It has no tires or legs, and its weapons are stored within, leaving no weak points.
But when the Excavators attacks, its armor opens wide to reveal its weapons. A window of opportunity if there ever was one!

variables.name: Loading_Desc_032
variables.value:
A Scylla's deadliest weapon is the poison it sprays.
The poison appears as a tinted mist that surrounds the Scylla, lethal to all living creatures.

The denser (closer to the point of origin) the poison mist is, the more damage it causes.
Get as far away from the Scylla as possible when it sprays!

variables.name: Loading_Desc_033
variables.value:
The Kraken is a fearsome creature %dq%armed%dq% with many tentacles.
Not only can it manipulate two shields at once, but it can also extend and retract its tentacles to defend a wide area.
However, its limbs are more fragile than its body.
First, attack its shields. When the shields turn black, target the tentacles to disarm it.

variables.name: Loading_Title_007
variables.value: Fight to Escape from a Net

variables.name: Loading_Title_009
variables.value: Don't Let Them Drag You Down

variables.name: Loading_Title_010
variables.value: Pilot Seats Are Not for Everyone

variables.name: Loading_Title_015
variables.value: Using Laser Sight to Confirm Target Range

variables.name: Loading_Title_016
variables.value: Using Laser Sight to Confirm Beacon Range

variables.name: Loading_Title_017
variables.value: Save an Ally Who's Being Bitten

variables.name: Loading_Title_020
variables.value: Acquire Items Even When Mission Fails

variables.name: Loading_Title_023
variables.value: Cannot Carry Two of the Same Weapons

variables.name: Loading_Title_025
variables.value: Putting the Backpack to Good Use

variables.name: Loading_Title_031
variables.value: Aim for the inside of the Excavator's armor

Because chat is restricted, you cannot join a room that allows chat.

variables.name: Lobby_Join_Impossible

In order to play the HARDEST or INFERNO difficulties,
you will need to complete the final mission on
EASY, NORMAL or HARD difficulty first.

*You can play both difficulties if you have been invited or if you join an online session.

variables.name: Lobby_NotHaveContents
variables.value: You cannot enter this room because you do not have the required content.

variables.name: Lobby_RoomName_NoInput

variables.value: Set conditions and start to search.

variables.name: Lobby_Search_Clear_Desc
variables.value: Clear Search Conditions, and use default status to search.

variables.name: Lobby_UGC_NotInvite
variables.value: You cannot enter non-Instant Rooms due to your preferences. You will be returned to the title screen.

variables.value:
%MPACKNAME% hasn't been purchased yet. You can still play it but you will not be able to equip newly acquired weapons.
Purchase %MPACKNAME% to equip new weapons.

variables.value: Earth Defense Force 6 save data slot

variables.name: MPack2_Message_M503
variables.value:
Do not leave your post.
Any defectors will be punished.

variables.name: Mission000_KeyWarning
variables.value:
%BUTTON% button hasn’t been assigned yet.
Please assign %BUTTON% button in the Change Controls menu.

variables.value: Move the mouse to change the orientation

variables.value: Move the mouse to change the orientation

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_AirRaider02
variables.value:
Press %SECONDADY_ATTACK% to detonate
Multishot (%PRIMARY_ATTACK%) and detonate (%SECONDADY_ATTACK%)
Destroy 4 targets

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_AirRaider03
variables.value:
Press %RELOAD% to reload
Press %RELOAD% to cancel bombs

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_AirRaider04
variables.value:
Press %CYCLE_WEAPON% to switch weapons
Air Raiders can equip three weapons
Some weapons cannot be used depending on the mission

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_AirRaider05
variables.value:
Eject a marker by pressing the %PRIMARY_ATTACK%
A Multicopter will attack the marker's landing point
Destroy all targets

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_AirRaider06
variables.value: Move left/right and press %JUMP% at the same time to perform emergency avoidance

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_AirRaider07
variables.value:
Press %USE_SUB% to use the backpack equipment
Activate Guard Capsule
Guard Capsule will automatically attack the enemy

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_Complete
variables.value: You have learned the attack controls.

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_Fencer01
variables.value:
Press %MULTIWEAPON_PRIMARYATTACK1% to use right-hand weapon
Hold button to launch
Destroy 4 targets

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_Fencer05
variables.value:
Press %MULTIWEAPON_PRIMARYATTACK1% to use right-hand weapon
Destroy all targets

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_Fencer06
variables.value:
Press %MULTIWEAPON_SECONDADYATTACK1% to use right-hand weapon's special action
(Right-hand weapon's second function)

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_Fencer07
variables.value:
Press %MULTIWEAPON_SECONDADYATTACK2% to use left-hand weapon's special action
(Left-hand weapon's second function)

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_Ranger04
variables.value: Press %PRIMARY_ATTACK% to shoot　　Destroy all targets

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_Ranger05
variables.value: Move left/right and press %JUMP% at the same time to perform emergency avoidance

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_Ranger06
variables.value:
Press %SPECIAL_ACTION% to dash
Put down your weapon during dash,
focus on your feet to widen the item collection range

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_Ranger07
variables.value:
Use backpack equipment with %USE_SUB%
Grenades, etc. are usually carried in the backpack, not in the hand

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_WingDiver04
variables.value:
Hold %PRIMARY_ATTACK% to charge power
Release to fire continuously until the charged power is used up
Destroy all targets

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_WingDiver05
variables.value:
Press %SPECIAL_ACTION% midair to thrust-boost
Can be used on the ground, but with shortened distance
Thrust-boost increases item collection range

variables.name: Mission000_Tuto1_WingDiver06
variables.value:
Press %USE_SUB% to use independently operated equipment
Runs on internal batteries and does not consume the flight unit's energy
Independently operated equipment can be reused after a certain amount of time

variables.name: Mission072_3_Balga_Control
variables.value:
Left stick:  Move
Right stick: Change direction
　　　　　　  Upper body back and forth
LB, RB : Punch
LT, RT : Stomp

The order in which LB and RB are pressed changes the way the arms swing.

variables.name: Mission072_3_Balga_Control_Keyboard
variables.value:
%MOVE_UP%, %MOVE_DOWN%, %MOVE_LEFT%, %MOVE_RIGHT%: Movement
Mouse operation: change direction
　　　　　　　　  Upper body forward/backward
%BULGAATTACK2_1%, %BULGAATTACK1_1%: Punch
%BULGAATTACK2_2%, %BULGAATTACK1_2%: Stomp

The order in which  %BULGAATTACK2_1% and %BULGAATTACK1_1% 
are pressed changes the way the arms swing.

variables.name: Mission072_3_Balga_Control_PS
variables.value:
Left stick:  Move
Right stick: Change direction
　　　　　　  Upper body forward/backward
L1, R1 : Punch
L2, R2 : Stomp

The order in which L1 and R1 are pressed changes the way the arms swing.

variables.name: Mission072_3_Balga_Control_Switch
variables.value:
Left Stick:  Move
Right Stick: Change direction
　　　　　　  Upper body forward/backward
L, R　 : Punch
ZL, ZR : Stomp

The order in which L and R are pressed changes the way the arms swing.

variables.name: RoomType_Everyone_Desc
variables.value: Modded hosting in public lobbies is not recommended due to the potential for instability and unexpected behavior that can disrupt gameplay for all participants. Modifications may introduce bugs or conflicts that were not present in the original game, leading to crashes, unfair advantages, or a poor experience for players. Furthermore, joining a modded lobby without understanding the changes can lead to confusion and frustration, ultimately harming the community's enjoyment and trust. It's best to keep modded content in private sessions where all participants are aware of and agree to the modifications.

variables.name: SoldierType_AirRaider_Info
variables.value:
A tactical soldier that is equipped with a communication system. The mission of the Air Raider is to work with the air force and provide coordinates for air strikes. The Air Raider annihilates the enemy by calling in bombers and gunships and designating attack targets. An Air Raider can even request vehicle drops.

*This soldier class is for intermediate players. It has the potential to deal a lot of damage, but it has to find itself in certain optimal situations to do so. Because the main purpose of this soldier class is to assist allies, it is best suited for cooperative gameplay. You should probably select this soldier class after you've gained a certain degree of familiarity with the game.

variables.name: SoldierType_Fencer_Info
variables.value:
A heavily armed soldier fully equipped with a powered exoskeleton. Thanks to their powered exoskeletons, this soldier class is capable of equipping enormous weapons. Also, this soldier class can carry separate weapons in both arms and wield both of them at the same time. 

*This soldier class is for advanced players. Its controls are different from those of other soldier classes, and playing this class well requires learning several new techniques. Mastery of this class will grant players terrifying power, but the path to mastery is very challenging.

variables.name: SoldierType_Ranger_Info
variables.value:
Infantry special forces. Rangers are combat experts who can handle a wide range of weapons. They are also licensed to operate military vehicles on the battlefield.

*This soldier class is the easiest to use and has the highest combat strength. If you are playing the game for the first time, you should start out by choosing this soldier class.

variables.name: SoldierType_WingDiver_Info
variables.value:
An all-female special forces unit equipped with jetpacks. They carry state-of-the-art energy weapons instead of ballistic weapons to reduce weight. They deal the most damage among all classes.

*This soldier class is swift and deadly. However, their low HP (Armor) and defensive strength make them particularly susceptible to attacks.
